thread.title: Donna M. Caruana
thread.title_full: R&G Brenner Income Tax reviewed by Donna M. Caruana

author: Donna M. Caruana
title: Donna M. Caruana
text: R&G Brenner always treats me good. They are all very kind and helpful. They don't charge outrageous fees for their services, as other tax preparers do. I also think it's great, that if you refer someone to them, they give you $50.00 per person and I always walk out of there with gifts that they give. I don't know of any other tax service that does all of this. What can I say, "THEY'RE THE BEST" God's blessings R&G Brenner
